share.mailDialogText: With whom do you want to fight?

respond.explanation: An Empathy-Link is a communication framework that emphasizes empathy, honest expression, and mutual understanding. It focuses on identifying and expressing feelings and needs without judgment or blame, aiming to foster compassionate connections and resolve conflicts peacefully.

greeting.heading: sent you an Empathy-Link
greeting.question: Do you feel ready to open it?

disclaimer.heading: Please remeber
disclaimer.description: The things you are about to read don't have anything to do with you.

home.title: Homepage
home.hero: In todayâ€™s rush, amid endless distractions and mounting todo lists, being mindful of how and why you connect with your peers has never been more difficult.

fights.tableCaption: A list of your recent fights

name.label: What is the Name of the Person you are fighting with?
name.tooShortError: Name must be at least 3 characters long

observation.label: What did you observe?
observation.tooShortError: Please explain your observation in at least 10 characters

request.label: What is your Request?
request.tooFewError: Please formulate a request that has at least 10 characters
